answerText: Godel's incompleteness theorem(s)[10] The proofs of Godel's theorems rely on this technique to prove that there exist self-referential statements in sufficiently strong first order theories. It was also used by Cantor in a proof concerning the cardinality of the reals.
heading: DEES |2014 | William and Mary | 18 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The first one of these theorems says that any first order system of logic will have statements which are true but unprovable.  [10] Name this set of incompleteness theorems due to a German mathematician.
